IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE EDUCATION AND UNDERSTANDING OF PILGRIM HISTORY
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE GENERAL SOCIETY OF MAYFLOWER DESCENDANTS TELLS THE STORY OF THE JOURNEY OF THE PILGRIMS ABOARD THE MAYFLOWER IN 1620 BY PROVIDING EDUCATION AND UNDERSTANDING OF WHY THE PILGRIMS WERE IMPORTANT, HOW THEY SHAPED AMERICA AND WHAT THEIR 1620 VOYAGE MEANS TODAY.
IRS990.Desc: MAYFLOWER SOCIETY HOUSE-PRESERVE, PROTECT AND INTERPRET THIS 18TH CENTURY MANSION WHICH CONTAINS A COLLECTION OF DECORATIVE ARTS, ANTIQUES AND ARTIFACTS. THIS PROPERTY IS OPEN TO THE PUBLIC.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: GENEALOGICAL RESEARCH AND PUBLICATIONS-PUBLISH RESEARCH OF PROFESSIONAL GENEALOGISTS AND HISTORIANS IN AUTHORITATIVE BIOGRAPHICAL, GENEALOGICAL AND HISTORICAL PUBLICATIONS, EACH OF WHICH CONTAINS PREVIOUSLY UNKNOWN DETAILS OF THE LIVES OF PILGRIM DESCENDANTS. WE SELL THE RESULTING BOOKS AND OTHER RELATED MERCHANDISE TO OUR MEMBERS AND TO THE GENERAL PUBLIC.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: GENEALOGY VALIDATION- WE COLLECT AND HOUSE RESEARCH MATERIALS RELATING TO PILGRIM HISTORY, CULTURE AND THE GENEALOGY OF OUR MEMBERS AND MAINTAIN AN ON-SITE LIBRARY WHICH IS OPEN TO RESEARCHERS, GENEALOGISTS AND HISTORIANS.

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.PersonNm: SCHEDULE O LIST OF 51 FOR AG
SCHEDULE O LIST OF 50 FOR DGG

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SOCIETY ACQUIRES ITS COLLECTIONS, WHICH INCLUDE A HISTORICAL HOUSE WITH ARTIFACTS, BY PURCHASE USING TRUST FUNDS OR BY DONATION. ALL COLLECTIONS ARE HELD FOR PUBLIC EXHIBITION AND EDUCATION IN FURTHERANCE OF PUBLIC SERVICE RATHER THAN FINANCIAL GAIN. THE SOCIETY'S COLLECTIONS MANAGEMENT POLICY INCLUDES GUIDANCE ON THE PRESERVATION, CARE AND MAINTENANCE OF THE COLLECTIONS AND PROCEDURES RELATING TO THE ACCESSION/DEACCESSION OF ITEMS WITHIN THE COLLECTIONS. IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE PROVISIONS OF SFAS NO. 116, "ACCOUNTING FOR CONTRIBUTIONS RECEIVED AND CONTRIBUTIONS MADE", THE SOCIETY'S POLICY IS TO NOT CAPITALIZE ITS COLLECTIONS; THEREFORE, NO VALUE IS ASSIGNED TO THE COLLECTIONS ON THE STATEMENT OF FINANCIAL POSITION. PURCHASES OF COLLECTION ITEMS ARE RECORDED AS EXPENSE IN THE YEAR IN WHICH THE ITEMS ARE ACQUIRED. CONTRIBUTED COLLECTION ITEMS ARE NOT REFLECTED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. PROCEEDS FROM DEACCESSIONING OR INSURANCE RECOVERIES FROM LOST OR DESTROYED COLLECTION ITEMS ARE REFLECTED AS INCREASES IN THE APPROPRIATE NET ASSET CLASS. ITEMS THAT ARE ACQUIRED WITH THE INTENT AT THE TIME OF AQUISITION NOT TO ADD THEM TO THE COLLECTIONS BUT RATHER TO SELL, EXCHANGE, OR OTHERWISE USE FOR FINANCIAL GAIN ARE NOT CONSIDERED COLLECTION ITEMS, AND ARE RECORDED AT FAIR MARKET VALUE AT DATE OF ACQUISITION AS OTHER ASSETS IN THE STATEMENT OF FINANCIAL POSITION.
REFER TO PART III, LINE 1A DESCRIPTION

MAYFLOWER HOUSE ENDOWMENT FUND USED TO MAINTAIN THE PHYSICAL PROPERTIES. THE JOYCE GARRISON PARKE MEMORIAL FUND IS AVAILABLE FOR GENERAL OPERATIONS. THE MARY CHILTON WINSLOW SCHOLARSHIP FUND IS FOR SCHOLARSHIPS. IN ADDITION TO THE DONOR-RESTRICTED ENDOWMENTS REFERENCED ABOVE, THERE ARE TWO BOARD-DESIGNATED ENDOWMENT FUNDS, THE PILGRIM FUND AND THE GSMD SCHOLARSHIP FUND.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 1A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL MANAGEMENT DECISIONS ARE DELEGATED TO AN EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE BETWEEN THE ANNUAL MEETINGS OF THE FULL BOARD OF ASSISTANTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE GENERAL SOCIETY OF MAYFLOWER DESCENDANTS CONSISTS OF 54 MEMBER SOCIETIES. ALL PERSONS OVER EIGHTEEN YEARS OF AGE WHO ARE DESCENDED FROM A PASSENGER ON THE MAYFLOWER, ON THE VOYAGE THAT ENDED IN PLYMOUTH, NEW ENGLAND, IN DECEMBER, 1620, ARE ELIGIBLE FOR MEMBERSHIP.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL MEMBERS OF THE GOVERNING BODY ARE ELECTED BY MEMBERS OF THE MEMBER SOCIETIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COMPLETE COPY OF THE FORM 990 WAS REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE BEFORE FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PERSONNEL COMMITTEE, WHICH CONSISTS OF INDEPENDENT BOARD MEMBERS, REVIEWS THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR COMPENSATION ANNUALLY AS PART OF THE BUDGET PROCESS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE ON THE MASSACHUSETTS SECRETARY OF THE COMMONWEALTH'S WEBSITE.
